text: The Iranian plateau, also known as the Persian plateau is a geological formation in Southwest Asia, Southern Asia and the Caucasus region. As a historical region, it includes Parthia, Media and eastern Persia, the heartlands of Greater Persia (mainly Iran, Afghanistan, and Pakistan west of the River Indus).Old Iranian Online , University of Texas College of Liberal Arts (retrieved 10 February 2007) == References == Category:Landforms of Afghanistan Category:Landforms of Iran Category:Landforms of Pakistan Category:Plateaus
title: Iranian plateau
